Shannon Kook (a mụrụ Shannon Xiao Lóng Kook-Chun; 9 Febụwarị 1987) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro telivishọn Degrassi: The Next Generation (2010[[2011), Carmilla (2015[[2016), Shadowhunters (2017), na The 100 (2018), yana ọrụ ya dị ka Drew Thomas na ihe nkiri The Conjuring (2013[[2021).

A mụrụ Kook-Chun na Johannesburg, South Africa nye nna Mauritian nke sitere na China na nne South Africa nke sitere na Cape Coloured. Mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara Montreal iji gaa National Theatre School of Canada.
Ọrụ mbụ Kook na ihe nkiri bụ na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Canada Being Erica n'afọ 2009
A maara ya nke ọma na mba ụwa maka ọrụ ya dịka Zane Park na Degrassi: The Next Generation (2010X2011) na dịka Duncan na Shadowhunters (2017).

N'afọ 2014, a họọrọ Kook, Alexandre Landry, Sophie Desmarais, na Julia Sarah Stone, maka Rising Stars nke Toronto International Film Festival, ọdịiche kwa afọ nke na-eme ka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri anọ na-abịanụ na ndị na-emepụta nkà na ndị na'eme ihe nkiri na mmemme ahụ.
N'agbata afọ 2015 na 2016, Kook gosipụtara na usoro weebụ a ma ama Carmilla
N'afọ 2017, e gosipụtara ya na usoro weebụ Running With Violet

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2018, a mara ọkwa na a họpụtara Kook dịka onye ọbịa ọhụrụ dị omimi, Lucas, na oge nke ise nke CW's The 100. Nke a kpughere na ọ bụ red herring site n'aka onye na-egosi ihe nkiri Jason Rothenberg

E mechara kpughee ọrụ Kook dịka Jordan Jasper Green, nwa Monty Green na Harper McIntyre. Kook na mbụ nyochara maka ọrụ Finn Collins na Monty Green. Kook laghachiri dịka usoro na-aga n'ihu na oge nke isii na nke asaa.
